posts.name: Yash Aggarwal
posts.cooked:
Hello everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.90.0-beta.1. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta here.

Release notes:

Make privacy stick with five new official sticker packs in the Signal Artist Series: “Chug the Mouse” by Amanda Cotan, “Cozy Season” by Miguel Ángel Camprubí, “Croco’s Feelings” by Tiffany Beucher, “My Daily Life 2” by Plastic Thing, and “Rocky Talk” by Lexi Vay.

Commit changes: Comparing v7.89.0-beta.1…v7.90.0-beta.1 · signalapp/Signal-Desktop · GitHub
Previous beta: Beta feedback for the upcoming Desktop 7.89 release - #7 by Avitus

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming Desktop 7.89 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.90.0-beta.1

63 new commits since 7.89.0-beta.1:

Show commits

  • v7.90.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • [signalapp/Signal-Desktop#7693] Make formatting text with keyboard shortcuts irrespective of Caps Lock [2]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.63.0 [3]

  • Migrate sharedGroupNames from model attribute to Redux selector [4]

  • Update to the latest Group and Backups protos [5]

  • Switch provisioning to libsignal [6]

  • A few CSS tweaks and storybook fixes [7]

  • Update sidebar layout visibility in group calls [8]

  • Add support for PayPal donations [9]

  • Fix non-renderable media files losing filename on upload [10]

  • Support for Group Member Labels [11]

  • Update PayPal cancel handling [12]

  • Update group info permissions string [13]

  • Fix admin pin permissions in groups with admin-only edit settings [14]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.64.1 [15]

  • Update release note fetcher to delete unknown saved megaphones [16]

  • Follow up Key Transparency changes [17]

  • Group member label improvements [18]

  • storageRecordOps.toRecipient: Allow for missing recipients [19]

  • Update electron to 40.1.0 [20]

  • Fix donation receipt sorting to show most recent year first [21]

  • Add feature flag for remote megaphone [22]

  • Emoji reply in 1:1 conversation should not discard reply text [23]

  • Fix sticker message metadata color in dark mode [24]

  • Release notes for 7.89 [25]

  • Update strings [26]

  • Update DNS fallback [27]

  • Update text on paypal discard dialog [28]

  • Fix safeStorage use in CI [29]

  • Render group member labels in quotes [30]

  • Add new tailwind curved-* util for superellipses [31]

  • Limit member label width [32]

  • Show dialog if any non-admin labels when changing group info permission [33]

  • ContactModal: Show full label, even if very long [34]

  • Deduplicate incoming attachments on disk [35]

  • Update text in cancel PayPal dialog [36]

  • GroupMemberLabelEditor: Show dialog on save or permissions error [37]

  • Handle multiple visits to Paypal approval return URI [38]

  • Fix megaphone donate cta to navigate to amount picker and cache config in redux [39]

  • Simplify link preview image fetching [40]

  • Fix proto syntax in Migrations.proto [41]

  • Update localized emoji, fix search [42]

  • Update donation faq dialog [43]

  • Init AxoTooltip component [44]

  • Switch batchIdentityCheck to unauth socket [45]

  • Fix donate payment selection when Paypal is not supported [46]

  • Bump to libsignal v0.87.1 [47]

  • When deleting megaphones ensure they are removed in redux [48]

  • Fix some Key Transparency strings [49]

  • Reuse calculated height & width when deduplicating attachments [50]

  • Fix go to pinned message targeting outgoing messages [51]

  • Better Windows Store installation process [52]

  • Improve call link admin UI transition [53]

  • Fix visibility of KT in settings [54]

  • Fix draggable text and images in donations paypal and badge dialog [55]

  • Update Signal Artist Series sticker packs [56]

  • GroupMemberLabelEditor: Show all other members with group labels [57]

  • Add extra checks for OptionalResourceService [58]

  • Exclude our code from react ref lint-deps rules [59]

  • Better accounting of orphaned attachments [60]

  • release notes [61]

  • Update strings [62]

  • 7.90.0-beta.1 [63]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.89.0-beta.1…v7.90.0-beta.1

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked:
For a given chat, Desktop only shows files from last year instead of the files that have been sent to me from this contact this year when I look at the files tab under chat settings.

https://debuglogs.org/desktop/7.90.0-beta.1/eceeba46c50034771f640ec8a17b45f19bd752c42551a488e8e7965359eb824d.gz

The files are actually in the chat history, so I dunno why this is happening.

New Version: 7.90.0-beta.2

5 new commits since 7.90.0-beta.1:

  • Update PayPal return URI handler for redirect landing page [1]

  • Improve ref counting when deduplicating attachments on disk [2]

  • Add donation timeout for Paypal [3]

  • Update strings [4]

  • 7.90.0-beta.2 [5]
